'''''Amon Hen'' 67''' is the sixty-seventh issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in May [[1984]].

** By: Howard Bates

** By: Jeff Stevenson
